items.sentence: Eventually, Tom will tell me everything I want to know.
Everybody in the park looked up at the hot air balloon.
Everybody is drinking, and nearly everybody is smoking.
Everything depends on whether you pass the examination.
I don\'t feel well and would rather stay at home today.
I don\'t know how long this situation is going to last.
I don\'t know whether you are telling the truth or not.
I don\'t want to hurt Tom any more than I already have.
Tom and Mary sat on the beach and talked to each other.
Tom dropped out of college and founded his own company.
